moves.1. a4 e5 2. a5 d5 3. e3 f5 4. a6: Freddy wins quickly. The thematic tournament position.
moves.5. Bxa6 bxa6 6. d4 e4 7. Ne2 Bb4+ 8. Bd2: Black does not want to exchange the bad bishop.
moves.10... O-O 11. cxd5: Risky because it gives more scope to the black bishops but undermines the center.
moves.11... Qxd5 12. Nbc3 Qf7 13. Na4 Be6: A strong reaponse. Nc5 now loses a pawn.
moves.14. Nc5: ? Move made without thought. Best was b4 with only a slight advantage for black.
moves.16... Bc4: A good move; prevents 0-0 and protects a6. Black now has a won game.
moves.17. Ba5 Nd7: ! Another nice move; sets a trap.
moves.18... Nxc5: Excellent. Now black has a clear win.
moves.19. Kf1: Resignation is in order. White plays on a few more moves.
moves.19... Nb3 20. Qc3 Qxc7: ! Ingenious the threat is to take with check and then grab the Q and also to the rook.
